about.title: About TeraLab
about.subtitle: Transforming Auto Repair Excellence
about.description: Under Tera Motors, TeraLab delivers comprehensive consulting services for auto repair shop development and optimization.

contact.title: Book Your Consultation

contact.description: Schedule a consultation to discuss your auto repair shop needs

whatsapp.baseMessage: Hello TeraLab! I'm interested in your auto repair consulting services.
whatsapp.serviceInterest: I would like to learn more about your solutions.

motion.description: The comprehensive auto repair consulting that transforms workshops, is now available for all to experience. With years of industry expertise at its core, and a team of automotive professionals coming together, TeraLab embodies the spirit of innovation, excellence, and customer success. It operates with the precision of experts and delivers with the commitment of professionals.

about.title: Our Story
about.description: As the automotive industry evolved, our founders recognized the need for specialized consulting services that could transform traditional workshops into modern, efficient, and profitable businesses. How many workshop owners dreamed of streamlined operations, increased customer satisfaction, and sustainable growth? TeraLab is the love-child of automotive expertise and entrepreneurial vision.

footer.description: Leading automotive consulting services that transform workshops into successful businesses.

about.title: About Us
about.description: TeraLab is an AI-powered hybrid SaaS & consulting company specializing in designing, launching, and optimizing auto repair workshops. Positioned as a premium arm of Tera Motors, the brand blends intelligent automation with real-world expertise.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to transform the auto repair industry with intelligent guidance and end-to-end solutions, guiding entrepreneurs, investors, and existing workshop owners from concept to fully operational, profitable businesses.

endToEnd.title: End-to-End
endToEnd.description: Complete solutions from concept to operation

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Get in touch with our team of automotive experts. We're here to help transform your workshop into a successful business.

pricing.title: Our Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the perfect plan for your workshop transformation journey. We offer flexible solutions to meet your needs.

support.title: Support & Maintenance
support.description: We provide ongoing support and maintenance to ensure your workshop continues to operate at peak efficiency.
